column2: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)
Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2023), Attorney General Chambers, The Star, Undi.info. Refer to JOHOR_2018_DUN_CANDIDATE_AGE_SOURCE for complete list

There may be discrepancies for the age of candidates as there is no official data released for the attribute.There are many missing data points for age attribute for candidates. If year/date of birth is found, age of candidate shown here is the age of the candidate at the end of 31/12/2018. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier)
Parliamentary Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
Parliamentary Name (2018 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Name (2018 - present at the created Date)
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Electors of GE14. For full description of this electoral roll, refer to this Gazette: https://lom.agc.gov.my/ilims/upload/portal/akta/outputp/pub_20180410_P.U.%20(B)%20173.pdf
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll (as in A in all Form 14 + A in Form 15)
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box (as in D in all Form 14) and not returned (as in D in Form 15) (B-C-D)
Total number of rejected ballot papers (as in C in all Form 14 + C in Form 15)
Total number of votes by electors
